column1: #Text=The painting of Wikipedia co-founder Jimmy Wales , the uploading of which Wales called " harassment " .

#Text=You painted a portrait of Wikipedia co-founder Jimmy Wales in 2013 ; a picture and a video file of the making of this painting were uploaded to Wikipedia 's sister site for images and media , Wikimedia Commons .
#Text=Shortly thereafter , the files were nominated for deletion and a deletion discussion ensued — what are your thoughts on this discussion ?
#Text=I did not think Wikipedia censored anything as on Jimmy Wales ' Twitter account his banner heading is : " Wikia guy .

#Text=During the deletion discussion , Jimmy Wales commented  I encourage people to go to commons and work to explain to the community there some of the concepts behind Hostile environment sexual harrassment . I encourage everyone to seriously consider whether it is appropriate behavior to upload a clearly non-notable film of someone using his penis to paint a picture of a Wikipedia volunteer . It is harassment , it is trolling , and I am deeply disappointed to have to point this out to some people . "

column1: #Text=What do you think of his response to your artwork ?
#Text=Do you feel your paintings constitute harassment ?

#Text=Harassment is when one continually annoys someone , over and over again ; I only painted the one painting of him and it to my mind was not offensive , I consider my work as satire just like late night TV , something that gives light relief to a serious subject .
#Text=There are many examples of political cartoon images on Wikipedia , so why are they still up there or is it just the things Jimmy Wales does n't like get taken down ?
#Text=By the way anyone who has not seen the offending Video can view it on Vimeo under Pricasso : http://vimeo.com/user10315938/review/68837137/893b31ca54
#Text=I paint about 1000 portraits a year and get paid by the sitters or a close friend of them to do so .

#Text=I had a request to paint a portrait , to do [ this ] portrait of Jimmy Wales with a video of me painting , by Russavia ( who is an editor at Wikipedia ) , something I do all the time and I have great feedback as to how funny the videos are ; I had no idea who Jimmy Wales was at the time of the request , but painted him only once so it ca n't be called Harassment .
#Text=Is he just using his position of power to cut and censor ...
#Text=It took me a lot of effort and time to put this together so I was pretty upset .
#Text=And would really like it to be republished next to the portrait as originally it was before Mr Wales had it removed .
